name: Geometry Clash (jogjog1)
description:
You have to defeat strong geometry enemys with your defenses. The levels get increasingly more difficult.

How to play:

Click on a defense and drag it to a spot you want.

To upgrade a defense you have to drag the same defense on an already placed building with the same type.

Each time you place a defense, it costs "Upgrade Points". Every time they are at 0 all defenses get more expensive.

Click on the different speedtypes on the top right to control how fast the game speed is.

Click on a built defense to see its stats
Controls:

P- Pause the game

I hope you enjoy the game
